Content:
So I got the bike running rebuilt the carbs new jets and gaskets cleaned the gas tank resealed it replaced some electrical components, oil change filters ETC. and it was riding like a dream, came back the other day tried to start it and it wouldn't idle but it revs and it does that well so I thought hmm maybe my pilot got clogged so I pulled it cleaned along with the rest put it back on still wont idle it will however let me ride it in gear if I rely heavily on the clutch,

Do yall think its still the carbs or can yall think of anything else that might be causing the issue I appreciate it.
